snippet: Stone Phillips, formerly of "Dateline NBC," put online his news report on concussions in football. Now a version of it will run on the "PBS NewsHour."
abstract: Stone Phillips, formerly of "Dateline NBC," put online his news report on concussions in football. Now a version of it will run on the "PBS NewsHour."

headline.main: A Report for the Web, on TV
headline.print_headline: A Report for the Web, on TV
